name: Vice Online - Open World Games
description:
Vice Online offers an open-world sandbox-like game experience where players can hang out with their friends without the pressure of hard competition. Explore 60-players city playground filled with a wide assortment of luxury cars, boats, aircrafts and dozens of fun activities.

Explore the open-world with your friends and other players around the world. Find out which of you is a laborer, businessman, taxi driver or racer! You can take all the advantages you would enjoy while playing Vice Online!

Follow your favorite way of life in Vice Online. And, of course, invite your friends to play with you!

Unique open world, Lots of Vehicles, Various Realistic Weapons, Exciting Multiplayer Events, Car Tuning, Character Customization, Voice Chat — meet all these features in Vice Online Open-world.
